Articles.Content:
With the addition of time warp buttons at the KSC I was thinking it could be extremely useful to have buttons dedicated to warping to the next sunrise or sunset (maybe midday and midnight as well?). It would work just like a normal timewarp but would automatically go back to 1x time when the sun reaches the right position. This would make it much easier to swap between day and night for launches which I believe is the main purpose of having time warp on that screen.

Edited April 12, 2014 by KaBob

I agree with you, having the ability to warp right to certain times during the day would be really helpful. I myself almost always launch at sunrise so most of my missions can be done on the sunlit side of the planet.
And also to stop timewarp at node like it does when you hit atmosphere

+1

Until then, have you guys checked out the Kerbal Alarm Clock mod? This is literally the only change it makes to the game - adding the ability to set alarms that (optionally) stop warp, N minutes before

- arbitrary time

- node

- SOI change

Etc. Not game-breaking in any way, but perfect for exactly this niche.
